attributes.action: Reduce The Number of Houses Created For Immigrants and Higher The Support For UK Homelessness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This particular petition is focused on on the lack of support for Britains own homeless citizens and is against the constructions made for unknown immigrants! Not only will these houses disturb the wildlife, they are a waste of money when taking into account the fact that they are being used to house immigrants from other countries, when we have so many homeless UK nationals currently living on the streets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
